item.title: Google's new Alphabet, from A to Z (pictures) - CNET
item.description:
Google's new Alphabet, from A to Z (pictures) - CNET

Google will become part of a new parent company called Alphabet Inc. - Page 1

item.title: Philips Hue's newest smart lighting kit won't break the bank video - CNET
item.description:
Philips Hue's newest smart lighting kit won't break the bank video - CNET

With a connected bulb and a smart switch that doubles as a remote, the $40 Philips Hue Wireless Dimming Kit wants to ease you into smarter lighting.

item.title: What to watch on HBO Now and what's coming to iTunes, July 2015 video - CNET
item.description:
What to watch on HBO Now and what's coming to iTunes, July 2015 video - CNET

Scream, Lego and ballers, all that and more coming up on Netpicks. [music] Hey everybody, thanks for coming by, lets talk about the newest stuff to watch online, but first check out our new ticker up there, let us know what you think in the comments. First up, Apple Itunes.

item.title: New wave of Android Watches aims to make up for lost time - CNET
item.description:
New wave of Android Watches aims to make up for lost time - CNET

Can't get enough of smartwatches? Well, a whole new batch is on its way. Asus, Huawei, LG and Motorola will introduce their newest smartwatches next week at the IFA electronics trade show in Berlin, according to people familiar with the companies' launch plans.

item.title: 3D printing: Where Chattanooga's past meets its future - CNET
item.description:
3D printing: Where Chattanooga's past meets its future - CNET

CHATTANOOGA, Tennessee -- When Platt Boyd decided to quit his job as an architect and use his retirement savings to start a company that would construct buildings with a 3D printer, he didn't move his family to Silicon Valley or Brooklyn. He came here.

item.title: Export Google Keep notes to Docs - CNET
item.description:
Export Google Keep notes to Docs - CNET

If you write a lot of notes in Google Keep, you may find yourself needing to convert some of them to actual documents. For instance, if you take down a list of things to remember when you're reviewing a restaurant you've recently visited, you'll want to work it into a more readable format.

item.title: How to save URLs to your Dropbox folders - CNET
item.description:
How to save URLs to your Dropbox folders - CNET

For many users, Dropbox is the go-to tool for storing and sharing files, photos, music and the like. Put simply, it keeps everything under one roof. Well, almost everything. Until a couple days ago, Dropbox didn't support one particular form of data: Web links.
